div.p: An enumeration used to represent whether a person is affected by a condition of interest in the context of a pedigree.
This code system http://ga4gh.org/fhir/phenopackets/CodeSystem/affected-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: It is unknown whether the person is affected by the condition
Person is unaffected by the condition
Person is affected by the condition

publisher.value: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health

description.value: An enumeration used to represent whether a person is affected by a condition of interest in the context of a pedigree.

definition.value: It is unknown whether the person is affected by the condition
Person is unaffected by the condition
Person is affected by the condition
